headline: American Express Raises Fees And Tightens Lounges To Defend Premium Edge
summary: American Express (NYSE:AXP) is raising annual fees and expanding luxury benefits on premium cards as it competes more directly with JPMorgan Chase for high-end users. The company is also rolling out significant changes to Centurion Lounge access rules, affecting how and when cardholders can use these airport facilities. These moves target affluent and younger customers while addressing cost pressures tied to premium rewards and lounge usage. American Express sits at the center of the...
